I am a biochemist asking questions about microbial evolution and ecology. To address them, I develop computational methods and test them using quantitative experiments. If you want to know more about my research, check out my current research projects and some finished pieces

I was born in Belgrade, then the capital of Yugoslavia and today of Serbia. As a child, I emigrated with my family to Madrid, Spain, where I grew up. In 2016, I emigrated again, this time to New Haven, Connecticut (USA) to join Alvaro Sanchezâ€™s lab as a postdoc.
